site_name: Fleming Road / Whitecote RoadGolf Links EstateSouthallMiddlesexUB1 3NR
description: Details of Sustainable Design and Construction strategies, in pursuant to condition 15 of planning permission reference: 195348OUT dated 18.03.2020 for the; Outline planning permission for the demolition of all existing buildings and construction of a residential led mixed-use development comprising of up to 147 residential units (Use Class C3) of up to 8 storeys in height, including up to 500 sqm of flexible non-residential floorspace (Use Classes A1, A2, A3, B1, D1 and D2) and associated infrastructure (Regulation 3 Application by London Borough of Ealing).
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
